item.title: Epic games' Project Sword.
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
That’s without a doubt. With the control system they implemented though it should be fairly simple to move, turn and fire simultaneously with relative ease, but I guess we won’t know until the actual game is released and we can field-test it.

Personally, I’m much more interested in the games that will come after this. The engine performance and appearance is what I really like.
